member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplateElement.Title
member.summary: The title to display in the template. 80 character limit.

member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplateElement.ImageUrl
member.summary: Optional. The URL of the image to display in the template.

member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplateElement.Subtitle
member.summary: Optional. The subtitle to display in the template. 80 character limit.

member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplateElement.DefaultAction
member.summary: Optional. The default action executed when the template is tapped. Accepts the same properties as URL button, except title.

member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplateElement.Buttons
member.summary: Optional. An array of buttons to append to the template. A maximum of 3 buttons per element is supported.

member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplatePayload.Sharable
member.summary: Optional. Set to true to enable the native share button in Messenger for the template message. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplatePayload.ImageAspectRation
member.summary: Optional. The aspect ratio used to render images specified by element.image_url. Must be horizontal (1.91:1) or square (1:1). Defaults to horizontal.

member.name: P:FbMessengerClient.Messaging.MessageAttachments.Templates.Generic.GenericTemplatePayload.Elements
member.summary: An array of element objects that describe instances of the generic template to be sent. Specifying multiple elements will send a horizontally scrollable carousel of templates. A maximum of 10 elements is supported.
